content.question: Write a statement that uses the String method indexOf to find the index of the first "." in email and assign it to a variable. Write another statement that uses the String method indexOf to find the index of "@" and assign it to a variable.

frqParts.text: Write a statement that uses the String method indexOf to find the index of the first "." in email and assign it to a variable. Write another statement that uses the String method indexOf to find the index of "@" and assign it to a variable.

skill.text: 2.C: Write program code involving procedural abstractions.
